title: Enhancing Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Blended Training for Instructional Design and Learning Technology Experts

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in teaching-learning design for secondary education and job-based training
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: A mixed research methodology can be applied to systematically analyze IDLT (Instructional Design and Learning Technology) expert competencies
Flexibly apply IDLT theories and models suitable for the language education domain and design solutions utilizing digital tools (LMS, authoring software, etc.)
Perform projects that solve real-world educational problems by combining non-specific IDLT skills (communication/collaboration) with technological proficiency
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
